concept.title: Sample theme file
concept.shortdesc: Theme files can be written in either or format. The docsrc/samples/themes folder in the DITA-OT installation directory provides several examples.

conbody.note: The examples provided here are all in YAML format, which is generally more compact and readable than JSON.
conbody.p: The YAML theme file used to produce the PDF output for the DITA-OT documentation is included in the installation directory as /themes/dita-ot-docs-theme.yaml.
This file includes a series of common customizations that can be adapted for your own requirements.

example.title: Setting custom colors
example.p: You can use to define brand colors and re-use these values in other using semantic references such as $brand-color-primary.
